channel.title: Being Admin
channel.description:
Basically im getting pretty pissed off right now none of the sources im using have Login.java so basically i have to make myself admin via mainsave so i go into the mainsave then click on a user. change rights from 0 - 2. ive done this 100s of times and im still not server admin the number allways goes back to 0 even when the servers up or down. and as for my other source i open mainsave data via notepad+ and that only has username: in it nothing else.
anyone have any ideas?

item.title: Being Admin
item.dc:creator: @pkerA pkerA
item.description:
@pkerA wrote:

[quote=“nathanrr44, post:5, topic:317521”]my post is basically saying ive done this but it still doesnt work …[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 04, 2009, 02:42:15 pm[/size][hr]kk here i go mainsave then click my user icey.dat.

username:icey password:104690345893069 rights:0 donator:0 starter:0 firstlog:0 pickup pen:0 can’t leave pen:0 chatName: null tab0:0 tab1:0 tab2:0 tab3:0 tab4:0 tab5:0 tab6:0 tab7:0 tab8:0 tab9:0 tab10:0 bankx:50 note:0 insert:0 KC: 0 DC: 0 PVP potential: 0.0 kills: 0 total kills: 0 sExperience: 10000000 Last killed: degrade: 6000 absx:2725 absy:3491 height:0 runenergy:100 gender:0 look0:0 look1:10 look2:18 look3:26 look4:33 look5:36 look6:42 skill0:1,0 skill1:1,0 skill2:1,0 skill3:10,1155 skill4:1,0 skill5:1,0 skill6:1,0 skill7:1,0 skill8:1,0 skill9:1,0 skill10:1,0 skill11:1,0 skill12:1,0 skill13:1,0 skill14:1,0 skill15:1,0 skill16:1,0 skill17:1,0 skill18:1,0 skill19:1,0 skill20:1,0 skill21:1,0 skill22:1,0 skill23:1,0 skill24:1,0 mute:0 specAmount:0 spellbook:192 Xlog:0 quests:0 godWars0:0 godWars1:0 godWars2:0 godWars3:0 godWars4:0 null

i change rights from 0 - 2 and then i get no admin ive also tried makin myself donator and no donator either ive even tried both but they allways change back to 0.[/quote]

Does you save it???

Read full topic

item.title: Being Admin
item.dc:creator: @mr_templar mr templar
item.description:
@mr_templar wrote:

probally looks like mithscape 508. It has char files as .dat files and no player save system if it is mithscape switch!!!

item.title: Being Admin
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:2, topic:317521”]secondly, make sure your offline then change.[/quote][quote=“pkerA, post:3, topic:317521”]If you change to 2! you should get admin!
That simple[/quote]he is trying to say make sure you log out then change it save it and log back in
